name: Planetirium
description:
NOTE:

If every planet is destroyed, and it says 'You win!', then that is a glitch and you have NOT won (didn't notice till someone pointed it out AFTER the deadline).

This game was made for the BTP Game Jam, and was made in a week, please keep this in mind! The theme was Mini Planets.

---

Welcome to the pocket universe, where everything is small (at least from your view). Direct a tiny blue planet to other small planets and attempt to infect every planet with it! Can you take down the universe with ONE tiny planet? Or will every planet self-destruct in order to prevent your disease from spreading further?
